title: Turns Out Angie And New ‘Bachie’ Intruder Ryan Were DM’ing On IG Before The Show
text:
Angie Kent‘s dramatic as hell ~ journey ~ on The Bachelorette continues tonight, and as the previews have teased, we’re copping our first intruder. His name is Ryan Anderson and he’s the dog dude. The dog dude that already knows Angie.

If you’ve somehow dodged the ad, it’s time to watch it.

"Oh my god I know this guy" The Dog Whisperer is here and only Angie is happy to see him. #BacheloretteAU 7.30 tomorrow on 10. pic.twitter.com/ytqMCC79WF — #BacheloretteAU (@BacheloretteAU) October 14, 2019

So by the looks of it, Angie looks pretty keen on Ryan.

The 32-year-old is a rescue dog advocate, whose Instagram handle is AussieDogGuy. The dogs, he loves them which is a humongous tick for Angie.

He also really likes taking pictures with different breeds of floofers.

Speaking to 10Daily, Ryan said he and Angie DM’d a bit on Instagram before she was announced as the Bachelorette.

“I signed up for the show purely to get to know Angie – I had a bit of an online crush on her and I wanted to get to know her a bit better,” he said.

“We share a common interest in dogs and the rescue dog scene, and we’ve had a little bit of back and forth over social media for a while, but we had never actually met in person.”

Ryan, an ambassador for Empower Assistance Dogs, was planning on asking Angie to the organisation’s annual gala ball but was beaten to it by Bachie.

“The one girl I had my eye on incidentally turned out be the Bachelorette.”

Interestingly, Ryan is followed on IG by Bachie alumni Alex Nation and the Honey Badger. I’ve got no idea what that means but there you go.

The Bachelorette continues tonight 7.30pm on Channel 10.

If you want to relive last week’s truly dramatic episodes then aggressively click on our recaps below.
description: Angie Kent's dramatic as hell ~ journey ~ on The Bachelorette continues tonight, and as the previews have teased, we're copping our first intruder.
